About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, my name is Omar Cobas! I’m an aspiring computer engineer / computer scientist passionate about coding, video game development, web development and much much more. If you meet me, I'm quiet at first, but after a while we might just become best friends...

Where am I from?

I was born in Bronx, NY but both of my parents are Cuban immigrants. From them, and school, I learned Spanish. Since most of my family still lives in Cuba, sadly I don’t see them often.

What are my hobbies?

Besides coding I like to:

  • Watch anime! Anime is love, anime is life. I spend a lot of time analyzing then plot of popular and niche anime. In college, I intend on joining an anime club
  • In that same vein, I like to read manga! I’ve read quite a few manga, some of my favorite are:
    • One Piece
    • Naruto
    • One Punch Man
  • I like to play video games! I mostly play on PC, but I also play on console.
  • I love to learn cool, random things. I’ve spent so many weekends watching YouTube on the most random of things ranging from Psychology to Ethical Hacking. I treat YouTube as a main source of knowledge!
  • I hang out (and sometimes Skype) friends and family. We discuss, laugh, and fight with each other

My goals:

  • To only work on things I find cool
  • To build applications that makes people lives easier
  • To help those who have limited access to technology
